Breakfast Recipes.name: Idli
procedure: 1. Grease the idli plates with oil.
2. Pour the fermented idli batter into the molds.
3. Steam for 10–12 minutes until soft and fluffy.
4. Let it cool for 2 minutes, then remove idlis.
5. Serve hot with coconut chutney or sambar.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Dosa
procedure: 1. Heat a non-stick pan or tawa.
2. Pour a ladle of batter and spread thinly in a circular motion.
3. Drizzle some oil around edges.
4. Cook until golden and crisp, flip if desired.
5. Serve with chutney or sambar.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Omelette
procedure: 1. Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
2. Add onion and chili.
3. Heat oil in pan, pour mixture, cook until set.
4. Fold and serve hot.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Pancakes
procedure: 1. Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, milk, and egg into a smooth batter.
2. Heat a non-stick pan, pour a small amount.
3. Cook until bubbles appear, flip and cook other side.
4. Serve with syrup or fruits.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Poha
procedure: 1. Wash flattened rice and drain.
2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, sauté onion until translucent.
3. Add turmeric and peanuts, roast briefly.
4. Add poha, mix gently, cook 2–3 minutes.
5. Add lemon juice and serve.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Upma
procedure: 1. Roast rava until light golden, keep aside.
2. Heat oil, add mustard seeds, sauté onions and chili.
3. Add water and bring to boil.
4. Slowly add roasted rava, stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
5. Cook until thick, serve hot.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Sandwich
procedure: 1. Spread butter on bread slices.
2. Layer vegetables on one slice.
3. Sprinkle salt and pepper.
4. Cover with second slice, cut diagonally.
5. Toast if desired and serve.

Breakfast Recipes.name: French Toast
procedure: 1. Beat egg, milk, sugar, and cinnamon in a bowl.
2. Dip bread slices into the mixture, coating both sides.
3. Heat butter in pan, fry slices until golden on both sides.
4. Serve with honey or syrup.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Paratha
procedure: 1. Knead wheat flour with water into soft dough.
2. Divide into balls, roll out into circles.
3. Cook on hot tawa, apply oil/ghee, flip until golden.
4. Serve with curd or pickle.

Breakfast Recipes.name: Porridge
procedure: 1. Boil milk/water in a saucepan.
2. Add oats, cook on medium flame for 3–5 minutes.
3. Stir continuously until thickened.
4. Sweeten with honey or sugar.
5. Serve topped with fruits.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Plain Rice
procedure: 1. Wash rice under running water until water runs clear.
2. Soak rice for 20–30 minutes.
3. Boil water, add rice and salt.
4. Cover and cook on low flame until water is absorbed.
5. Fluff and serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
procedure: 1. Heat oil, add cumin seeds and onions, sauté until golden.
2. Add ginger-garlic paste, cook 1–2 minutes.
3. Add tomato puree and spices, cook until oil separates.
4. Add vegetables, cover, simmer 10–15 minutes.
5. Garnish with coriander, serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Roti
procedure: 1. Knead wheat flour with water and salt to make soft dough.
2. Divide into balls, roll out into circles.
3. Cook on hot tawa until golden and puffed.
4. Serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Sabzi
procedure: 1. Heat oil, add cumin seeds and sauté.
2. Add vegetables and spices, cook until tender.
3. Serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Dal
procedure: 1. Wash lentils and pressure cook with water and turmeric until soft.
2. Heat ghee, add cumin, pour over cooked dal.
3. Stir and serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Biryani
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken/veg with curd and spices for 30 min.
2. Cook half-cooked rice separately.
3. Layer rice and chicken/veg, add fried onions.
4. Cook on low flame (dum) for 20–25 min.
5. Serve hot with raita.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Fried Rice
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté vegetables until tender.
2. Add rice and soy sauce, mix well on high flame.
3. Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Pasta
procedure: 1. Boil pasta until al dente, drain.
2. Heat oil, sauté vegetables, add tomato sauce.
3. Mix pasta with sauce, serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Soup
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté vegetables if using.
2. Add stock, bring to boil.
3. Cook until ingredients are tender.
4. Blend if desired, season, and serve hot.

Lunch / Dinner Recipes.name: Raita
procedure: 1. Whisk yogurt until smooth.
2. Add chopped cucumber and spices.
3. Mix well and serve chilled.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Pakoda
procedure: 1. Mix gram flour, chili powder, and salt.
2. Add sliced onions and mix to form thick batter.
3. Heat oil in a pan.
4. Drop spoonfuls of batter into hot oil.
5. Fry until golden brown and crispy. Serve hot.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: French Fries
procedure: 1. Peel and cut potatoes into sticks.
2. Soak in water for 30 minutes to remove starch.
3. Heat oil in a deep pan.
4. Fry potatoes until golden and crispy.
5. Drain excess oil, sprinkle salt, and serve.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Momos
procedure: 1. Knead flour with water into smooth dough.
2. Roll dough into thin circles.
3. Place filling in center, fold and seal edges.
4. Steam for 10–12 minutes until cooked.
5. Serve with spicy chutney.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Nachos
procedure: 1. Spread tortilla chips on a baking tray.
2. Sprinkle cheese over chips.
3. Bake in preheated oven at 180°C for 5–7 minutes until cheese melts.
4. Serve hot with salsa.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Samosa
procedure: 1. Knead flour with water to form dough.
2. Make potato filling with spices.
3. Roll dough into circles, cut, fold cones, fill with potatoes, seal.
4. Deep fry until golden brown.
5. Serve with chutney.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Cutlets
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables boiled and mashed
procedure: 1. Mix mashed vegetables with spices.
2. Shape into small patties and coat with bread crumbs.
3. Heat oil and shallow fry cutlets until golden.
4. Serve hot.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Chaat
procedure: 1. Arrange papdi on plate.
2. Top with boiled potatoes, curd, and chutneys.
3. Sprinkle spices and mix lightly.
4. Serve immediately.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Spring Rolls
procedure: 1. Stir-fry vegetables with soy sauce.
2. Place filling on wrapper, fold and seal edges.
3. Deep fry until crispy and golden.
4. Serve hot with sauce.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Paneer Tikka
procedure: 1. Marinate paneer cubes with yogurt and spices for 30 minutes.
2. Grill or pan-fry until slightly charred.
3. Serve hot with mint chutney.

Snacks & Appetizers.name: Veg Pakora
procedure: 1. Mix gram flour with spices to make batter.
2. Dip vegetables into batter and fry in hot oil until golden.
3. Drain and serve with chutney.

Desserts.name: Gulab Jamun
ingredients: Sugar syrup prepared with 1 cup sugar and 1 cup water
procedure: 1. Mix khoya and flour to make dough.
2. Shape into small balls.
3. Deep fry on low flame until golden.
4. Soak in warm sugar syrup for 30 minutes.
5. Serve warm.

Desserts.name: Rasgulla
procedure: 1. Boil milk, curdle using lemon juice to get chenna.
2. Knead chenna until smooth, form small balls.
3. Boil in sugar syrup until spongy and soft.
4. Serve chilled or warm.

Desserts.name: Kheer
procedure: 1. Wash rice, cook in milk on low flame until soft.
2. Add sugar and cardamom, simmer 5–10 min.
3. Garnish with nuts and serve warm or chilled.

Desserts.name: Ice Cream
procedure: 1. Heat milk and sugar until dissolved.
2. Cool and mix cream and flavor.
3. Freeze mixture, stirring occasionally to avoid ice crystals.
4. Serve chilled.

Desserts.name: Cake
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Cream butter and sugar, add eggs and milk.
3. Mix flour and baking powder, fold into batter.
4. Pour into greased pan, bake 25–30 min.
5. Cool and serve.

Desserts.name: Pudding
procedure: 1. Mix sugar and cornflour in a little milk to make slurry.
2. Boil remaining milk, add slurry, cook until thick.
3. Add flavor essence, pour into serving bowls.
4. Chill and serve.

Desserts.name: Halwa
procedure: 1. Heat ghee, roast semolina until light golden.
2. Boil water and sugar, add to roasted semolina.
3. Stir continuously, cook until thick.
4. Add cardamom powder, serve hot.

Desserts.name: Brownie
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Melt butter, mix with sugar and eggs.
3. Add flour and cocoa powder, mix to smooth batter.
4. Pour into pan, bake 20–25 min.
5. Cool, cut into squares, serve.

Desserts.name: Ladoo
procedure: 1. Roast gram flour in ghee until golden and aromatic.
2. Add sugar, mix well.
3. Shape into small balls while warm.
4. Let cool and serve.

Desserts.name: Rasmalai
procedure: 1. Boil milk, add sugar, cardamom, and saffron.
2. Soak paneer balls in warm milk for at least 30 minutes.
3. Serve chilled.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Tea
procedure: 1. Boil water, add tea leaves and simmer 2–3 minutes.
2. Add milk and sugar, bring to boil.
3. Strain into cup and serve hot.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Coffee
procedure: 1. Boil water, add coffee powder, simmer 2 minutes.
2. Add milk and sugar, boil briefly.
3. Serve hot.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Milkshake
procedure: 1. Blend milk, ice cream, and fruits until smooth.
2. Serve chilled.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Juice
procedure: 1. Blend fruits with water until smooth.
2. Strain if desired, serve chilled.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Smoothie
procedure: 1. Blend yogurt and fruits until smooth.
2. Sweeten with honey, serve chilled.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Mojito
procedure: 1. Muddle mint leaves, lemon juice, and sugar.
2. Add ice cubes and top with soda water.
3. Stir gently, serve chilled.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Lassi
procedure: 1. Blend yogurt with water, sugar, and cardamom.
2. Serve chilled.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Cold Coffee
procedure: 1. Blend milk, coffee powder, sugar, and ice cubes.
2. Pour into glass, top with whipped cream if desired.
3. Serve immediately.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Hot Chocolate
procedure: 1. Heat milk, add cocoa powder and sugar.
2. Stir until fully dissolved.
3. Serve hot, top with whipped cream.

Drinks & Beverages.name: Green Smoothie
procedure: 1. Blend spinach, banana, and water/milk until smooth.
2. Sweeten with honey, serve chilled.

Soups.name: Tomato Soup
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions and garlic until fragrant.
2. Add chopped tomatoes, cook 5–7 minutes.
3. Add water or stock, boil 10 minutes.
4. Blend until smooth, season with salt and pepper.
5. Serve hot.

Soups.name: Chicken Soup
procedure: 1. Boil chicken with vegetables in water for 20–25 minutes.
2. Remove chicken, shred if desired.
3. Season with salt and pepper.
4. Serve hot.

Soups.name: Mushroom Soup
procedure: 1. Sauté mushrooms in butter until soft.
2. Add milk, simmer 5–10 minutes.
3. Blend until smooth, season with salt and pepper.
4. Serve hot.

Soups.name: Sweet Corn Soup
procedure: 1. Sauté onion and ginger-garlic paste.
2. Add corn and stock, cook 10 minutes.
3. Blend half of the soup for creaminess.
4. Season and serve hot.

Soups.name: Vegetable Soup
procedure: 1. Boil vegetables in stock until tender.
2. Blend if desired for smooth texture.
3. Season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
4. Serve hot.

Soups.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
procedure: 1. Boil chicken and vegetables in stock.
2. Add noodles and cook until tender.
3. Season and serve hot.

Soups.name: Lentil Soup
procedure: 1. Boil lentils with water until soft.
2. Sauté onion with spices, add to cooked lentils.
3. Blend if desired, season, and serve.

Soups.name: Minestrone Soup
procedure: 1. Boil vegetables in stock until tender.
2. Add pasta and tomato paste, cook until pasta is done.
3. Season and serve hot.

Soups.name: Hot and Sour Soup
procedure: 1. Boil mushrooms and bamboo shoots in stock.
2. Add soy sauce and vinegar, simmer 5 minutes.
3. Serve hot.

Soups.name: Pumpkin Soup
procedure: 1. Boil pumpkin in stock until soft.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Season, garnish with cream, serve hot.

Salads.name: Vegetable Salad
procedure: 1. Chop all vegetables finely.
2. Mix with olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
3. Serve fresh.

Salads.name: Fruit Salad
procedure: 1. Chop fruits into small pieces.
2. Drizzle with honey or sprinkle sugar.
3. Mix gently and serve chilled.

Salads.name: Pasta Salad
procedure: 1. Mix boiled pasta and vegetables.
2. Add mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
3. Toss well and serve chilled.

Salads.name: Chicken Salad
procedure: 1. Mix chicken and vegetables.
2. Add mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
3. Toss and serve chilled.

Salads.name: Greek Salad
procedure: 1. Chop vegetables and cheese.
2. Mix with olives, olive oil, and oregano.
3. Serve fresh.

Salads.name: Coleslaw
procedure: 1. Mix cabbage and carrot.
2. Add mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
3. Toss well and serve chilled.

Salads.name: Bean Salad
procedure: 1. Mix beans, onion, and tomato.
2. Add olive oil and salt.
3. Toss and serve.

Salads.name: Cucumber Salad
procedure: 1. Slice cucumber.
2. Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Mix and serve chilled.

Salads.name: Corn Salad
procedure: 1. Mix corn and bell peppers.
2. Add mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
3. Toss well and serve.

Salads.name: Avocado Salad
procedure: 1. Mix avocado, tomato, and onion.
2. Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
3. Serve immediately.

Baked Dishes.name: Pizza
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 200°C.
2. Spread tomato sauce on pizza base.
3. Add toppings and sprinkle grated cheese.
4. Bake for 12–15 minutes until cheese melts and edges are golden.
5. Slice and serve hot.

Baked Dishes.name: Garlic Bread
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Mix butter, garlic, and parsley.
3. Spread on bread slices and bake 10 minutes.
4. Serve hot as an appetizer.

Baked Dishes.name: Cookies
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Cream butter and sugar, add vanilla.
3. Mix in flour and baking powder to form dough.
4. Shape into cookies and bake 12–15 minutes.
5. Cool and serve.

Baked Dishes.name: Muffins
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Mix wet ingredients: milk, egg, melted butter.
3. Combine dry ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder.
4. Fold wet into dry, pour into muffin cups.
5. Bake 15–20 minutes, cool, serve.

Baked Dishes.name: Lasagna
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Layer sheets, sauces, vegetables/meat, and cheese in baking dish.
3. Repeat layers, finish with cheese on top.
4. Bake 25–30 minutes until cheese is golden.
5. Serve hot.

Baked Dishes.name: Brownie
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Melt butter, mix with sugar, cocoa, and vanilla.
3. Beat in eggs, fold in flour.
4. Pour into greased pan, bake 20–25 minutes.
5. Cool, cut, and serve.

Baked Dishes.name: Cheesecake
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 160°C.
2. Mix crushed biscuits with melted butter, press into pan for base.
3. Beat cream cheese, sugar, and egg for filling.
4. Pour over base, bake 25–30 minutes.
5. Chill before serving.

Baked Dishes.name: Quiche
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Whisk eggs and milk, season with salt and pepper.
3. Add vegetables/meat and cheese, pour into crust.
4. Bake 25–30 minutes until set.
5. Serve warm.

Baked Dishes.name: Bread Pudding
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Tear bread into cubes.
3. Mix milk, sugar, eggs, vanilla.
4. Pour mixture over bread, let soak 10 minutes.
5. Bake 30–35 minutes, serve warm.

Baked Dishes.name: Apple Pie
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 190°C.
2. Toss apples with sugar, flour, and cinnamon.
3. Fill pie crust with apple mixture, cover with top crust.
4. Bake 35–40 minutes until golden.
5. Cool slightly and serve.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Chicken Curry
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions until golden.
2. Add ginger-garlic paste, cook 1–2 minutes.
3. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until oil separates.
4. Add chicken, cook 10–15 minutes.
5. Add water, simmer 20 minutes until tender.
6. Serve hot with rice or roti.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Mutton Curry
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions until golden.
2. Add spices, tomatoes, and cook 5 minutes.
3. Add mutton and water, pressure cook 20 minutes.
4. Check tenderness, simmer if needed.
5. Serve hot.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Fish Fry
procedure: 1. Marinate fish with turmeric, chili, and salt 15 minutes.
2. Heat oil in pan, shallow fry fish 3–4 minutes per side.
3. Serve hot with lemon wedges.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Prawns Fry
procedure: 1. Marinate prawns with spices.
2. Heat oil and fry prawns 5–7 minutes until cooked.
3. Serve hot.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Egg Curry
procedure: 1. Sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste in oil.
2. Add tomatoes and spices, cook 5 minutes.
3. Add water to make gravy.
4. Add boiled eggs, simmer 5 minutes.
5. Serve hot.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Grilled Chicken
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices 1–2 hours.
2. Preheat grill or oven to 200°C.
3. Grill chicken 10–15 minutes per side until cooked.
4. Serve hot.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Butter Chicken
procedure: 1. Cook chicken in butter until lightly browned.
2. Add tomato puree and spices, simmer 10 minutes.
3. Stir in cream, cook 5 minutes.
4. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices 1 hour.
2. Cook rice until 70% done.
3. Layer chicken and rice, add fried onions.
4. Cook on low flame (dum) 20 minutes.
5. Serve hot.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Grilled Fish
procedure: 1. Marinate fish with lemon juice and spices.
2. Preheat grill, cook 5–7 minutes per side.
3. Serve hot.

Non-Veg Recipes.name: Chicken Soup
procedure: 1. Boil chicken with vegetables in water 20 minutes.
2. Shred chicken, season with salt and pepper.
3. Serve hot.

Veg Recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
procedure: 1. Heat butter, add tomato puree and spices, cook 5 minutes.
2. Add paneer cubes, simmer 10 minutes.
3. Stir in cream, cook 2 minutes.
4. Serve hot with naan or rice.

Veg Recipes.name: Dal Tadka
procedure: 1. Boil dal until soft.
2. Heat oil, add cumin, onion, and tomato, sauté.
3. Add spices, pour over dal.
4. Mix and serve hot.

Veg Recipes.name: Rajma Masala
procedure: 1. Pressure cook rajma until soft.
2. Heat oil, sauté onions, add tomatoes and spices.
3. Add rajma, simmer 10 minutes.
4. Serve hot with rice.

Veg Recipes.name: Chole
procedure: 1. Pressure cook chickpeas until soft.
2. Heat oil, sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
3. Add chickpeas, simmer 10 minutes.
4. Serve hot with bhature or rice.

Veg Recipes.name: Mixed Vegetable Curry
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
2. Add vegetables, cook 10–15 minutes until tender.
3. Serve hot.

Veg Recipes.name: Palak Paneer
procedure: 1. Blanch spinach and blend into puree.
2. Heat oil, sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
3. Add spinach puree and paneer cubes, cook 5 minutes.
4. Serve hot.

Veg Recipes.name: Aloo Gobi
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions with spices.
2. Add potatoes and cauliflower, cook until tender.
3. Serve hot.

Veg Recipes.name: Baingan Bharta
procedure: 1. Roast eggplant until charred, peel and mash.
2. Heat oil, sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
3. Add mashed eggplant, cook 5 minutes.
4. Serve hot.

Veg Recipes.name: Matar Paneer
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
2. Add peas and cook 5 minutes.
3. Add paneer cubes, simmer 5 minutes.
4. Serve hot.

Veg Recipes.name: Kadhi Pakora
procedure: 1. Mix gram flour and yogurt with water to make kadhi.
2. Prepare pakoras by mixing gram flour, onion, and spices.
3. Fry pakoras until golden.
4. Boil kadhi, add pakoras, cook 5 minutes.
5. Serve hot with rice.

Rice Recipes.name: Biryani
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken/vegetables with yogurt and spices 1 hour.
2. Cook rice until 70% done.
3. Layer rice and chicken/vegetables, add fried onions.
4. Cook on low flame (dum) 20 minutes.
5. Serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Pulao
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté vegetables and spices.
2. Add rice, stir, add water, cook until rice is done.
3. Serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Fried Rice
procedure: 1. Heat oil, sauté vegetables.
2. Add rice and soy sauce, stir-fry 5–7 minutes.
3. Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Curd Rice
procedure: 1. Mix rice with yogurt and salt.
2. Prepare tempering, add to rice, mix well.
3. Garnish with coriander, serve chilled or warm.

Rice Recipes.name: Lemon Rice
ingredients: Tempering: mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chili, oil
procedure: 1. Heat oil, add tempering ingredients.
2. Add rice and lemon juice, mix well.
3. Serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Tamarind Rice
procedure: 1. Heat oil, add spices and tamarind paste.
2. Add rice, mix well.
3. Garnish with roasted peanuts, serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
procedure: 1. Sauté vegetables with spices.
2. Layer rice and vegetables, add fried onions.
3. Cook on low flame (dum) 20 minutes.
4. Serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Coconut Rice
ingredients: Tempering: mustard seeds, curry leaves, oil
procedure: 1. Heat oil, add tempering ingredients.
2. Add grated coconut, sauté briefly.
3. Mix with rice, serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Jeera Rice
procedure: 1. Heat ghee/oil, add cumin seeds.
2. Add rice, sauté briefly.
3. Add water, cook until rice is fluffy.
4. Serve hot.

Rice Recipes.name: Vegetable Khichdi
procedure: 1. Rinse rice and dal, set aside.
2. Heat oil, sauté vegetables and spices.
3. Add rice, dal, and water, cook until soft.
4. Serve hot.

Street Food.name: Pani Puri
procedure: 1. Crack a small hole in puris.
2. Fill with potatoes and sprouts.
3. Dip in spiced water, serve immediately.

Street Food.name: Pav Bhaji
procedure: 1. Boil and mash vegetables.
2. Cook in butter with spices 10 minutes.
3. Serve with buttered pav buns.

Street Food.name: Vada Pav
procedure: 1. Deep fry spiced potato vadas.
2. Place in pav buns, add chutneys.
3. Serve hot.

Street Food.name: Momos
procedure: 1. Roll dough into circles.
2. Fill with stuffing, shape momos.
3. Steam for 10–12 minutes.
4. Serve hot with chutney.

Street Food.name: Rolls
procedure: 1. Place filling on roti.
2. Roll tightly and grill slightly.
3. Serve hot.

Street Food.name: Chaat
procedure: 1. Layer papdi with potatoes and chickpeas.
2. Add yogurt, chutneys, and spices.
3. Serve immediately.

Street Food.name: Corn Chaat
procedure: 1. Mix corn with chopped onions, tomatoes.
2. Add lemon juice and spices.
3. Serve chilled or warm.

Street Food.name: Aloo Tikki
procedure: 1. Mash potatoes and mix with spices.
2. Shape into patties.
3. Shallow fry until golden.
4. Serve with chutneys.

Street Food.name: Chilli Paneer
procedure: 1. Fry paneer cubes until golden.
2. Sauté capsicum and onions in oil.
3. Add sauces, toss with paneer.
4. Serve hot.

Street Food.name: Sev Puri
procedure: 1. Top puris with potatoes, onions, and chutneys.
2. Sprinkle sev on top.
3. Serve immediately.

Healthy Recipes.name: Oats Porridge
procedure: 1. Boil milk or water.
2. Add oats and cook until thick.
3. Sweeten with honey and top with fruits.
4. Serve warm.

Healthy Recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
procedure: 1. Chop vegetables and place in bowl.
2. Add grilled chicken slices.
3. Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice, toss.
4. Serve immediately.

Healthy Recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
procedure: 1. Heat oil, add vegetables, stir-fry 5–7 minutes.
2. Add soy sauce and seasonings, toss well.
3. Serve hot.

Healthy Recipes.name: Smoothie Bowl
procedure: 1. Blend banana and yogurt to make thick smoothie.
2. Pour into bowl, top with fruits and chia seeds.
3. Serve chilled.

Healthy Recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
procedure: 1. Mix cooked quinoa with chopped vegetables.
2. Add olive oil, lemon juice, and salt.
3. Serve fresh.

Healthy Recipes.name: Grilled Fish
procedure: 1. Marinate fish with lemon juice and spices.
2. Grill until cooked through.
3. Serve hot.

Healthy Recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
procedure: 1. Boil all vegetables in water until tender.
2. Blend partially, season with salt and pepper.
3. Serve hot.

Healthy Recipes.name: Fruit Salad
procedure: 1. Chop fruits into bite-sized pieces.
2. Drizzle honey or lemon juice.
3. Toss and serve.

Healthy Recipes.name: Sprouts Salad
procedure: 1. Mix sprouts with chopped vegetables.
2. Add lemon juice and salt, toss well.
3. Serve fresh.

Healthy Recipes.name: Chia Pudding
procedure: 1. Mix chia seeds with milk, let soak overnight.
2. Sweeten with honey, top with fruits.
3. Serve chilled.
